snippet.title: Wildfrost | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/WildfrostSteam

Take on the elements in Wildfrost, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder! Journey across a frozen tundra, collecting cards strong enough to banish the eternal winter…

Coming to Steam & Nintendo Switch in Winter 2022. 
Developed by Deadpan Games & Gaziter. Published by Chucklefish.

http://wildfrostgame.com
Join the Discord: http://discord.gg/wildfrost
